page.title: 01Introduction Shobdon/Byton
page.content:
The area includes part of the village of{Shobdon}and part of the smaller village of{Byton}in North West Herefordshire. Both villages are in the original {Domesday Book}and also the manor of Milton, now only a large farm on the southern border of the area.
The area is in the hilly area of the {Welsh Marches}and is almost entirely agricultural.There are a number of small lakes in the area.
A holiday residential caravan site including club house, tennis courts and a golf course is situated round two of these lakes in Shobdon. Also in Shobdon are two factories. The larger factory produces concrete castings and blocks.The smaller factory makes aluminium window frames.
